Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh have won three of their last five ODIs against South Africa.
South Africa demolished the challenge of England in their previous match to bring their campaign back on track.
Bangladesh are woefully out of form with three consecutive losses.
The pitch at Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai provided South Africa the opportunity to put a massive first innings score of 399 on the board against England.
The average first-innings score at Wankhede Stadium in ODI cricket is 251, which is expected to be breached when South Africa take on Bangladesh.
